articles.title: Congratulations to Zimbabwean President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Zimbabwean President
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday sent a congratulatory message to Emmerson Mnangagwa who was inaugurated as the president of Republic of Zimbabwe.
					 Kim in the message wished the president big success in his responsible work for the country's stability and prosperity and regional peace and development, expressing the belief that the long-standing and traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to strengthen in the future, too.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Egyptian President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Egyptian President
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of sympathy to Abdel Fattah al-Sisi, president of Egypt, as regards a terrorist act in Egypt that claimed heavy casualties.
					 In the message Kim expressed deep sympathy and condolences to the Egyptian president and through him to the government and people of Egypt and victims and bereaved families.
					
					 The DPRK opposing all forms of terrorism and support for them including a state terrorism and patronage and support for terrorists which are committed under the pretext of "counter-terrorism" strongly denounces the recent terrorist act in Egypt as a vicious act aimed at destroying the country's stability and checking the development of the Egyptian people, the message said.
					
					 Kim wished the friendly government and people of Egypt successes in their work for eradicating the misfortune caused by the recent terrorist attack as soon as possible, defending the country's security and stability and building developed and prosperous Egypt.

articles.title: Sympathy to Egyptian Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Sympathy to Egyptian Foreign Minister
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Ri Yong Ho sent a message of sympathy to his Egyptian counterpart Sameh Shoukry on Sunday in connection with a terrorist attack in Egypt which caused huge casualties.
					 Voicing firm stand against all forms of terrorism and support for it which harass security and peace and bring misfortune to innocent people, and expressing strong denunciation of it, the message expressed the conviction that the Egyptian government and people would overcome pain and sorrow over the recent terrorist act and turn out in the struggle to wipe out terrorists and achieve the stability and unity of the country.

articles.title: DPRK Government Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Government Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government delegation headed by Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho came back home on Monday after paying an official visit to the Republic of Cuba.

articles.title: Party and State Commendations Awarded to Persons Who Worked Feats in Fruit Growing
articles.content:
Party and State Commendations Awarded to Persons Who Worked Feats in Fruit Growing
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- Party and state commendations were awarded to officials, innovators, scientists and researchers who have worked feats in fruit growing.
					 Officials and workers in the field of fruits growing reaped an unprecedentedly rich fruit harvest.
					
					 An awarding-ceremony took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday.
					
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, and participants in the national meeting of activists in the field of fruit growing.
					
					 Ri Tae Hyok received a watch bearing the august name of President Kim Il Sung and Choe Yong Ik and Han Myong Jo watches bearing the august name of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Citations of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, were conferred upon eleven persons including Kim Kwang Sok and Kim Chol Nam and a citation of Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, upon Ri Ju Ho.
					
					 Ri Song Chol received the title of Merited Scientist and Kim Yong Chol and Ju Jae Gun the title of Merited Tractor Driver.
					
					 Order of National Flag First Class went to 27 persons, Order of Labor to 20 persons, Order of National Flag Second Class to 153, Order of National Flag Third Class to 124, Merit Medal to 9 and Agricultural Merit Medal to 54.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Here
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- A joint delegation of political parties of the State Duma of Russia headed by Kazbek Taysaev, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation who is head of the Russia-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group of the State Duma, arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: Indian Embassy Officials Visit Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies
articles.content:
Indian Embassy Officials Visit Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies 
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- Indian Ambassador to the DPRK Jasminder Kasturia and her embassy officials Monday visited the Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies on its birthday.
					 Being briefed on its proud history, they went round various lecture rooms.
					
					 At the end of the visit, Jasminder Kasturia wished the university bigger success in its education.
					
					 They donated teaching materials to the university.

articles.title: DPRK Marathoner Wins Gold Medal in Asian Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Marathoner Wins Gold Medal in Asian Championship
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Hye Kyong of the DPRK came first at the 16th Asian Marathon Championship held in China on Sunday.
					 The championship brought together more than 40 men and women players from 18 countries including the DPRK, Uzbekistan, China and Japan, and the region.

articles.title: Music and Dance Performance Given in Nampho City
articles.content:
Music and Dance Performance Given in Nampho City
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus, the Moranbong Band and the Wangjaesan Art Troupe gave a joint music and dance performance in Nampho City from Nov. 16 to 26.
					 The Nampho City Art Theatre, a venue of the performance, was crowded everyday with working people from industrial establishments and co-op farms and students in the city.
					
					 Put on the stage were such numbers as male solo and chorus "Song Dedicated to Mother Party", light music and series of songs "Oh Party, It's Thanks to Your Care", male trio and male chorus "The Glow over Kangson" and tap dance "Young Days".
					
					 The performers made a noble musical representation of the profound trust and reverence of all the servicepersons and civilians for the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Narrative poem "Nampho, the land of miracle, glorify the tradition of Chollima!" mesmerized the audience as it reflected the will of the people of the city to bring about a fresh upswing in every field of building an economic power true to the call of the Party.
					
					 Such songs as "Song of Big Fish Haul" were also put on the stage, adding to the atmosphere of the performance.
					
					 At the turn of numbers, audience mounted the stage to present bouquets to the performers.
					
					 The performance was highly acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: Revolutionary Drama Staged in Sinuiju of DPRK
articles.content:
Revolutionary Drama Staged in Sinuiju of DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- A revolutionary drama "A Letter from a Daughter" was staged in Sinuiju City, North Phyongan Province from Nov. 24 to 27.
					 The drama deals with the matters of enlightening the popular masses and awakening them to consciousness and proves the truth of life that knowledge is power through jokes and laughs.
					
					 The performance was appreciated by officials, working people of various circles and schoolchildren in the province.

articles.title: LED Headlight for Electric Locomotive Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
LED Headlight for Electric Locomotive Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- LED headlight was recently developed by the Institute of Electronic Goods in the DPRK to replace high-candlepower glow headlights for electric locomotives.
					 It is said that electric locomotives of the Pyongyang Railway Bureau were already equipped with LED headlights.
					
					 The new LED headlight is 3 times stronger than the existing high-candlepower glow headlight in brightness, 100 times longer in illuminant serviceable life and 60 percent less in power consumption.
					
					 According to Ri Myong Chol, section chief of the institute, the LED headlight is a high-tech product with focusing-lens function.

articles.title: Kosong Bamboo Thicket, Natural Monument of DPRK
articles.content:
Kosong Bamboo Thicket, Natural Monument of DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has many natural monuments to be handed down to posterity.
					 Among them is the bamboo thicket, which covers some areas of Samilpho-ri and Sunhak-ri, Kosong County, Kangwon Province.
					
					 Warm and rainy climatic conditions of Kosong County are favorable for the cultivation of bamboo.
					
					 After acquainting himself with the natural and geographical conditions of the county on a scientific basis, President Kim Il Sung sent 56 bamboo saplings to the local people in March Juche 48 (1959).
					
					 Those saplings were planted in Sunhak-ri and Samilpho-ri.
					
					More than 1,600 bamboo shoots have been sprouted every year in the thicket.
					
					 True to the instruction of the President to acclimatize and mass-cultivate bamboo, Kosong County has created a bamboo thicket covering over 300 hectares.
					
					 The county came to be a producer of various bamboo goods like floral basket, fan and angling rod.

articles.title: DPRK Will Invariably Advance, True to Line on Developing Two Fronts: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Invariably Advance, True to Line on Developing Two Fronts: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea will surely accelerate the final victory in the standoff with the U.S., true to the great line of developing the two fronts, while meeting the desperate challenges of the U.S. and its followers, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 The U.S. is driving the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of war by mobilizing huge aggression forces while tightening the sanctions upon the DPRK, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 This is the vicious scheme to justify Trump-type "crazy strategy" and hostile policy toward the DPRK and escalate the moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. persistent moves for sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK are the last-ditch efforts of the losers who repeatedly suffered bitter setbacks in the confrontation with the latter.
					
					 No matter how desperately old lunatic Trump may try to isolate and stifle the DPRK by "demonizing" it, he can never cover up his criminal nature as chieftain of aggression and war and the biggest sponsor of terrorism.
					
					 The U.S. put the DPRK back on the list of "sponsors of terrorism" and is applying additional sanctions against it. This is most clearly proving that the DPRK is making a long drive.
					
					 The U.S. is mulling getting something from sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK. This is a pipedream of the fools who are utterly ignorant of the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms "Liberal Korea Party" of S. Korea Cesspit of Corrupt Politics
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms "Liberal Korea Party" of S. Korea Cesspit of Corrupt Politics
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- The prosecution of south Korea has directed an investigation to the "Liberal Korea Party" as scandals of the conservative group including traitor Park Geun Hye's confidants are being revealed one after another.
					 The coteries of the LKP are busy employing all sorts of trickery in a bid to disturb the investigation and the efforts for combating evils.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday comments this as a useless try of the chieftains of the scandals seeking to escape the final ruin, those being forsaken by history.
					
					 The conservative coteries led a luxurious life by lording it over the people with the power and wealth they grabbed through scandals. It is just a matter of time that they will be sternly punished for their unpardonable crimes.
					
					 The LKP is, indeed, a cesspit of corrupt politics as it is little short of a ring of bandits keen on gratifying its own greed, indifferent to misfortune and pain of the people. It treated the working masses of south Korea like dogs and pigs and threw the south Korean politics into a nasty theater of power-backed scandals, being engrossed in high-handed and arbitrary acts.
					
					 That's why the south Korean people are scathingly criticizing the LKP and its predecessors "Saenuri Party" and "Grand National Party" as "party of bandits", "party of swindlers" and "party of scandals."
					
					 Every sin brings punishment. The criminals will have to pay dearly for their crimes.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korea Plan Large-Scale Joint Military Drills against DPRK
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korea Plan Large-Scale Joint Military Drills against DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers plan to stage large-scale joint military exercises against the DPRK in the air and the sea from Dec. 4 to 8, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The warmongers are going to let over 230 fighters with various missions of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and the south Korean air force make sorties to the sky above south Korea from eight bases in Japan and south Korea in order to hold a war drill simulating an actual war.
					
					 It is said that six F-22s and three to four F-35As will be involved in the air drill codenamed Vigilant Ace.
					
					 It is the first time that six F-22s which are called strategic weapons by the U.S. imperialists are introduced into south Korea.
					
					 The said drills will also reportedly involve about 12,000 troops from navy and marine corps.
					
					 With the mobilization of such huge forces, the warmongers bluff that they would hold the drill of making precision strikes at key objects in the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Internet Newspaper Criticizes "Liberal Korea Party"
articles.content:
S. Korean Internet Newspaper Criticizes "Liberal Korea Party"
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- An editorial censuring the "Liberal Korea Party" of south Korea for hindering the support for the victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army was posted on the south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People on Nov. 24.
					 Noting that the 2018 budget for supporting the victims was shelved due to the LKP's opposition, the editorial termed the LKP's behavior impudent.

articles.title: S. Koreans Call for Punishing Those Responsible for Hiding Fact about Discovered Remains of Victim of Ferry Sinking
articles.content:
S. Koreans Call for Punishing Those Responsible for Hiding Fact about Discovered Remains of Victim of Ferry Sinking
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- The April 16 Family Council and the April 16 Solidarity of south Korea reportedly held a press conference at the building of the "National Assembly" on Nov. 23. They made public a statement calling for punishing those who hided the fact about the discovery of remains of a victim of the Ferry Sewol Disaster.
					 Although remains of a victim were found when cleaning mud off the hull of the ferry, a person concerned of the Ministry of Marine Transport and Fishery hided the fact on Nov. 17, the statement recalled.
					
					 It urged the authorities of the ministry to investigate those involved in the case, make an official apology to the families of the victims and the people and take a step to prevent its recurrence and find out the remains of victims still missing.

articles.title: Release of Union Leader Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Release of Union Leader Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- Candidates for chairman, vice-chairman and secretary general of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) at a press conference held on Nov. 24 before Hwasong Prison called for setting free Chairman of the organization Han Sang Gyun and lifting the search for Secretary General Ri Yong Ju who is on the wanted list, the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo said.
					 In the press release the organization denounced the present "government", which came to existence with the commitments to the abolition of evil administration and the great reform of society, for not releasing even one of those who were thrown into prison under the repressive Park Geun Hye regime.
					
					 They were heroes of the candlelight demonstrations as they fought for the rights and existence of all workers and citizens, the press release said.
					
					 It urged the "government" to set free Han Sang Gyun and show its will to realize society where labor is respected.
					
					 If the "government" does not take appropriate measure by the end of the year, the KCTU would take it a top priority task in its struggle against "government" to have Han Sang Gyun released from prison.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Myanmar
Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- A committee of Myanmar for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed on Nov. 15.
					 Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee set a month of December as a remembrance period and decided to organize political and cultural events praising the exploits of Kim Jong Il and introducing socialist Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Thailand
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Thailand
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- A Thai committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed on Nov. 15.
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events including a remembrance meeting, seminar, photo and film show in the run-up to the 6th anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Italy
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- An Italian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Rome on Nov. 16.
					 Miriam Pelegrini Peri, chairwoman of the Italian Committee for the Study of Songun Idea for Independence and Sovereignty, was elected chairwoman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il and organize political and cultural events supporting the struggle of the Korean people advancing towards the final victory.

articles.title: Korea's Socialist Medical Care Introduced in India, DR Congo
articles.content:
Korea's Socialist Medical Care Introduced in India, DR Congo
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- The Indian newspaper Asia Caber Daily and the website of DR Congo carried articles introducing the advantageous socialist medical care of the DPRK.
					 The Indian newspaper on Nov. 15 said in an article titled "The universal, free medical care in the DPRK":
					
					 President Kim Il Sung saw to it that a decision of the Cabinet on starting the universal, free medical care throughout the northern half of Korea was made public in November 1952 during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The DPRK has enforced the perfect and universal, free medical care under which the state is responsible for the health of people and takes care of them.
					
					 The people are benefited from the free medical care all over the country regardless of whether they live in cities or rural areas.
					
					 All services such as prevention and treatment of diseases are free of charge.
					
					 The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo on Nov. 13 posted on its website an article titled "DPRK - the country of free medical care" saying that the long-cherished desire of humankind for creating and enjoying a happy life in good health has come true in the DPRK. The article went:
					
					 Perfect and universal, free medical care is the people-oriented policy of public health enforced in the DPRK.
					
					 The good material and technical conditions for substantially ensuring the free medical care have been provided in the DPRK.
					
					 Okryu Children's Hospital, Breast Tumor Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital, Ryugyong Dental Hospital, Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital and other medical service bases have been built all over the country and hospitals and clinics can be seen not only at factories and enterprises but also in mountainous villages and on remote islands,.
					
					 Children and mothers with babies receive special state benefits.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised in Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised in Myanmar
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- HE Kim Jong Il is the great leader who protected the prestige of the Korean people by turning socialist Korea into a politico-ideological power and military power.
					 This was mentioned in a press release made public at the inaugural ceremony of a committee of Myanmar for remembering leader Kim Jong Il on Nov. 15.
					
					 The exploits performed by HE Kim Jong Il for the Korean revolution and humankind are shining brilliantly and encouraging the world anti-imperialist forces in their struggle against the imperialist invasion and threat, the press release said, adding:
					
					 His exploits will shine long in the hearts of the Korean people and the world progressives.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al recien electo presidente de Zimbabwe
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al recien electo presidente de Zimbabwe
Pyongyang, 27 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 25 un mensaje de felicitacion al Emmerson Mnangagwa, elegido como presidente de la Republica de Zimbabwe.
					En su misiva, el remitente expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que se consolidaran y se desarrollaran en el futuro tambien las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con larga historia y tradicion entre los dos paises y formulo sinceros votos por mayores exitos en los trabajos responsables del destinatario para la estabilidad y la prosperidad del pais y la paz y el desarrollo de la region.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente egipcio
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente egipcio
Pyongyang, 27 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea envio el dia 26 un mensaje de consuelo a Abdel Fattah al-Sisi, presidente de la Republica Arabe de Egipto, en relacion con que hubo muchas perdidas humanas por el terrorismo ocurrido en este pais africano.
					En la misiva, el remitente expreso la profunda simpatia y condolencias al destinatario y, por su conducto, al gobierno, el pueblo y los familiares de las victimas.
					
					Tras exponer la posicion de la RPDC de oponerse al terrorismo de todas formas y su apoyo inclusive el terrorismo estatal, que se perpetra bajo el rotulo de la "guerra antiterrorista", y el amparo, la proteccion y el apoyo a los terroristas, el remitente subrayo que la RPDC condena categoricamente el terrorismo recien ocurrido en Egipto calificandolo del acto vil para perturbar la estabilidad del pais e impedir el desarrollo del pueblo egipcio.
					
					Y deseo al gobierno y pueblo amistosos egipcios que liquiden cuanto antes las desgracias causadas por el ataque terrorista y logren exitos en los trabajos para defender la seguridad y la estabilidad del pais y construir el Egipto desarrollado y prospero.

articles.title: Ri Yong Ho envia mensaje de condolencias a su homologo egipcio
articles.content:
Ri Yong Ho envia mensaje de condolencias a su homologo egipcio
Pyongyang, 27 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con muchas perdidas humanas causadas por un atentado terrorista en Egipto, el canciller coreano Ri Yong Ho envio el dia 26 un mensaje de condolencias a su homologo egipcio Sameh Shoukry.
					En su misiva, el remitente condeno categoricamente todas formas de terrorismo y apoyo al mismo que perturban la seguridad y paz del pais y causan desgracias a los habitantes inocentes.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que el gobierno y pueblo egipcios aniquilaran a los terroristas y se levantaran en la lucha por lograr la estabilidad y unidad del pais superando el dolor y tristeza provenientes del incidente terrorista.

articles.title: Tiene lugar la ceremonia de condecoracion del partido y el Estado
articles.content:
Tiene lugar la ceremonia de condecoracion del partido y el Estado
Pyongyang, 27 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 27 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la ceremonia de premiacion del partido y el Estado a los funcionarios, innovadores, cientificos e investigadores benemeritos de la rama fruticola.
					Asistieron a la ocasion Yang Hyong Sop, vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, y los participantes en la reunion nacional de activistas de la rama fruticola.
					
					Fue otorgada el reloj con el nombre inscrito del Presidente Kim Il Sung a Ri Tae Hyok, el reloj con el nombre inscrito del Dirigente Kim Jong Il a Choe Yong Ik y Han Myong Zo, el diploma de honor del Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jong Un, a Kim Kwang Sok, Kim Chol Nam y otras 9 personas y el diploma de honor del Comandante Supremo del EPC Kim Jong Un a Ri Ju Ho.
					
					El titulo de Cientifico Benemerito correspondio a Ri Song Chol, el titulo de Conductor de Tractor Benemerito a Kim Yong Chol y Ju Jae Gun.
					
					Fue otorgada la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase a 27; la Orden del Trabajo a 20; la Orden Bandera Nacional de segunda clase a 153; la Orden Bandera Nacional de tercera clase a 124; la Medalla del Merito Laboral a 9 y la Medalla del Merito Laboral de la Agricultura a 54.

articles.title: Llega a Pyongyang delegacion conjunta de partidos politicos de Duma Estatal de Rusia
articles.content:
Llega a Pyongyang delegacion conjunta de partidos politicos de Duma Estatal de Rusia
Pyongyang, 27 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Arribo el dia 27 a esta capital la delegacion conjunta de partidos politicos de la Duma Estatal de Rusia, encabezada por Kazbek Taysaev, secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de la Federacion Rusa y jefe del grupo parlamentario de amistad Rusia-Corea de la Duma Estatal.

articles.title: Maratonista coreana sobresale en el campeonato asiatico
articles.content:
Maratonista coreana sobresale en el campeonato asiatico
Pyongyang, 27 de noviembre (ACNC) -- La maratonista coreana Kim Hye Gyong ocupo el primer lugar en el 16o Campeonato Asiatico de Maraton, efectuado el dia 26 en China.
					En la presente cita deportiva tomaron parte mas de 40 jugadores de ambos sexos de 18 paises y regiones inclusive la RPDC, Uzbekistan, China y Japon.
					
					El record de Kim es 2 horas 28 minutos 38 segundos.
